text: When Harry Met Sally is a 1989 American romantic comedy movie. It was written by Nora Ephron and directed by Rob Reiner. It stars Billy Crystal as Harry and Meg Ryan as Sally. They are friends in Chicago who, from 1977 to 1989, become a couple. The movie is about relationship problems. It received positive reviews by movie critics and its revenue at the box office was high. == Other websites == * Category:1989 romantic comedy movies Category:American romantic comedy movies Category:English-language movies Category:Movies set in Chicago Category:Movies shot in Chicago Category:Movies set in the 1970s Category:Movies directed by Rob Reiner Category:1980s English-language movies
title: When Harry Met Sally
